## Datenquelle

Global Administrative Boundaries (GADM)

![pic](http://www.gadm.org/img/gadm2.png)

## Schnittstelle in R-Paket raster

```{r,echo=F}
Ex <- F
library("knitr")
```

Daten fÃ¼r Deutschland auf Bundesebene:

```{r,eval=Ex}
library("raster")
DEU0 <- getData('GADM', country='DEU', level=0)
```

## Overview data

```{r,eval=F,eval=Ex}
DEU0@data
```

```{r,echo=F,eval=Ex}
kable(DEU0@data[,1:5])
```

## Daten Gemeindeebene:

```{r,eval=Ex}
library("raster")
DEU3 <- getData('GADM', country='DEU', level=3)
```


## Subselect

```{r,eval=Ex}
SAL <- DEU4[DEU4@data$ID_1==12,]
```

```{r,eval=Ex}
plot(SAL)
```

## Karten mit Farbe

```{r,eval=Ex}
plot(SAL,col="blue")
```

## Neue Variable erzeugen

```{r,eval=Ex}
SAL$Zufall <- runif(length(SAL))
```

## Das Paket sp

```{r,eval=Ex}
library(sp)
spplot(SAL,"Zufall")
```
